metadata.synopsis: The party take the boat to Morphic Pool, where they will encounter the Netherbrain.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Click on the boat in the LOW SewersAccept the ready check

1.speaker: Narrator
1.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [party board; disembark]

Party steps into the skiff on the water. 
Boat departs from riverbank and sinks into the darkness as it goes down-river.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *Silence but for the gentle, rhythmic slap of water on rock as your vessel cuts through.*
0.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [Boat moves through water]

The boat moves off into darkness
